snippet: Singh’s Sporting Goods in Queens is the place to find New York’s cricket community buying everything needed to play and enjoy the world’s second most popular sport.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Singh's Sporting Goods in Ozone Park, Queens, which serves New York City's steadily growing cricketing community.
lead_paragraph: Singh’s Sporting Goods in Queens is the place to find New York’s cricket community buying everything needed to play and enjoy the world’s second most popular sport.

headline.main: Singh’s Sporting Goods, for Cricket’s Serious Bowlers and Wicketkeepers
